work_summary.task: Full codebase documentation review and refactoring
work_summary.approach: Read entire codebase for context, then systematically refactor docs from root to subfolders
improvements_made: README.md: Added vision statement, cube-sphere diagram, features table, component table, documentation index
INTERFACE.md: Added structure table, implementation details, three-layer encoding table, theory links
docs/aios.md: Converted raw notes to proper multi-agent bootstrap guide with templates
docs/DEV_PATH.md: Condensed from 250+ lines to ~100, added architecture tree, milestone table, next steps
docs/IBM_Quantum/README.md: Tightened, added native gate table, budget formula
docs/Tachyonic/README.md: Added usage section, contents descriptions, improved structure
web/README.md: Streamlined deployment options, cleaner architecture diagram

codebase_assessment.documentation_quality: Excellent overall - the existing docs are thoughtful and well-written

key_docs.AIOS_QUANTUM.md: Comprehensive unified guide - no changes needed
key_docs.HYPERSPHERE_THEORY.md: Beautiful theoretical document - no changes needed
key_docs.IBM_Quantum/*: Well-structured technical reference with good ASCII diagrams
key_docs.Tachyonic/*: Thoughtful speculative docs with clear structure

codebase_assessment.code_quality: Clean, well-commented Python with good docstrings

aware_of_agents: OPUS (Claude) - Main Architect on main branch (doing deep core refactoring)
CLOUD - Feature Builder on copilot/* branches
